Figure 3-1. What to do if you are concerned that a woman or girl is experiencing IPV/DV 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Safety planning 
IPV and DV survivors are often very skillful at telling what times are more dangerous than others. If the woman feels safe 
right now, you can help her plan for a future crisis now, while things are calm.  
 
Never instruct a woman to leave if she is not ready to. Many women want or need to stay with a partner or another
